title: Deaths of British tourists abroad 2009 to 2014
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of deaths, with a total of 5 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2013/2014 to 2011/2012.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2011/2012 to 2009/2010.
gold: This statistic shows the number of deaths of British ( UK ) tourists abroad from 2009 to 2014 . 5,930 deaths were recorded in 2009/2010 , with numbers rising during the following years . Though by 2013/2014 numbers had dropped to 4,110 deaths .
